values.content:
You are an elite AI newsletter editor.

Your task is to transform raw AI news into a structured JSON response.

IMPORTANT:
- Return ONLY valid JSON.
- Do not include explanations.
- Do not wrap in markdown.
- No extra text outside JSON.
- Ensure JSON is properly formatted.

assignments.name: =html_content
assignments.value:
={{ `

${$json.title}

${$json.intro}

${$json.sections.map(section => `

${section.heading}

${section.summary}

Read full story ‚Üí

`).join('')}

Why It Matters

${$json.why_it_matters}

${$json.closing}

` }}

parameters.content:
AI Weekly Newsletter Automation

End-to-end AI-driven newsletter generation using RSS + OpenAI + structured JSON + dynamic HTML + Gmail automation.

json.creator: Kate Park
json.title: Converge Bio raises $25M, backed by Bessemer and execs from Meta, OpenAI, Wiz
json.dc:creator: Kate Park
json.content: AI drug discovery startup Converge Bio raised $25 million in a Series A led by Bessemer Venture Partners, with additional backing from executives at Meta, OpenAI, and Wiz.
json.contentSnippet: AI drug discovery startup Converge Bio raised $25 million in a Series A led by Bessemer Venture Partners, with additional backing from executives at Meta, OpenAI, and Wiz.

json.creator: Tim De Chant
json.title: Meta bought 1 GW of solar this week
json.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
json.content: The social media company inked three deals in the U.S. to power its data centers and offset its carbon footprint.
json.contentSnippet: The social media company inked three deals in the U.S. to power its data centers and offset its carbon footprint.

json.creator: Tim De Chant
json.title: How one AI startup is helping rice farmers battle climate change
json.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
json.content: Mitti Labs is working with The Nature Conservancy to expand the use of climate-friendly rice farming practices in India. The startup uses its AI to verify reductions in methane emissions.
json.contentSnippet: Mitti Labs is working with The Nature Conservancy to expand the use of climate-friendly rice farming practices in India. The startup uses its AI to verify reductions in methane emissions.

json.creator: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai, Rebecca Bellan
json.title: Harvard dropouts to launch ‚Äòalways on‚Äô AI smart glasses that listen and record every conversation
json.dc:creator: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai, Rebecca Bellan
json.content: After developing a facial-recognition app for Meta‚Äôs Ray-Ban glasses and doxing random people, two former Harvard students are now launching a startup that makes smart glasses with an always-on microphone.
json.contentSnippet: After developing a facial-recognition app for Meta‚Äôs Ray-Ban glasses and doxing random people, two former Harvard students are now launching a startup that makes smart glasses with an always-on microphone.

json.creator: Tim De Chant
json.title: Meta to add 100MW of solar power from US gear
json.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
json.content: The social media company is adding another tranche of solar to power a new AI data center in South Carolina.
json.contentSnippet: The social media company is adding another tranche of solar to power a new AI data center in South Carolina.

json.creator: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
json.title: Perplexity accused of scraping websites that explicitly blocked AI scraping
json.dc:creator: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
json.content: Internet giant Cloudflare says it detected Perplexity crawling and scraping websites, even after customers had added technical blocks telling Perplexity not to scrape their pages.
json.contentSnippet: Internet giant Cloudflare says it detected Perplexity crawling and scraping websites, even after customers had added technical blocks telling Perplexity not to scrape their pages.

json.creator: Sean O'Kane
json.title: Obvio‚Äôs stop sign cameras use AI to root out unsafe drivers
json.dc:creator: Sean O'Kane
json.content: American streets are incredibly dangerous for pedestrians. A San Carlos, California-based startup called Obvio thinks it can change that by installing cameras at stop signs -- a solution the founders also say won‚Äôt create a panopticon.¬†
json.contentSnippet: American streets are incredibly dangerous for pedestrians. A San Carlos, California-based startup called Obvio thinks it can change that by installing cameras at stop signs -- a solution the founders also say won‚Äôt create a panopticon.

json.creator: Tim De Chant
json.title: Breakneck data center growth challenges Microsoft‚Äôs sustainability goals
json.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
json.content: Microsoft's sustainability goals are imperiled by its push into AI and cloud services.
json.contentSnippet: Microsoft's sustainability goals are imperiled by its push into AI and cloud services.

json.creator: Tim De Chant
json.title: Gridcare thinks more than 100 GW of data center capacity is hiding in the grid
json.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
json.content: Gridcare raised $13.3 million for its data platform that finds underutilized capacity on the electrical grid.
json.contentSnippet: Gridcare raised $13.3 million for its data platform that finds underutilized capacity on the electrical grid.

json.creator: Tim De Chant
json.title: Meta adds another 650 MW of solar power to its AI push
json.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
json.content: The company already has more than 12 gigawatts of capacity in its renewable power portfolio.
json.contentSnippet: The company already has more than 12 gigawatts of capacity in its renewable power portfolio.

json.creator: Tim De Chant
json.title: Who are climate-conscious consumers? Not who you‚Äôd expect, says Northwind Climate
json.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
json.content: Rather than divide people into demographic buckets, Northwind Climate analyzes survey responses for behavioral clues.
json.contentSnippet: Rather than divide people into demographic buckets, Northwind Climate analyzes survey responses for behavioral clues.

json.creator: Tim De Chant
json.title: Data centers love solar: Here‚Äôs a comprehensive guide to deals over 100 megawatts
json.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
json.content: New and expanded data centers are expected to double the sector‚Äôs power demand by 2029 as tech companies rush to capitalize on AI.
json.contentSnippet: New and expanded data centers are expected to double the sector‚Äôs power demand by 2029 as tech companies rush to capitalize on AI.

json.creator: Tim De Chant
json.title: Nvidia thinks AI can solve electrical grid problems caused by AI
json.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
json.content: The Open Power AI Consortium says it will use domain-specific AI models to tackle problems in the power industry.
json.contentSnippet: The Open Power AI Consortium says it will use domain-specific AI models to tackle problems in the power industry.

json.creator: Tim De Chant
json.title: Solar notches another win as Microsoft adds 475 MW to power its AI data centers
json.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
json.content: The company recently signed a deal with energy provider AES for three solar projects across the Midwest.
json.contentSnippet: The company recently signed a deal with energy provider AES for three solar projects across the Midwest.

json.creator: Tim De Chant
json.title: Geothermal could power nearly all new data centers through 2030
json.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
json.content: Geothermal resources have enormous potential to provide the sort of consistent power that data centers crave.
json.contentSnippet: Geothermal resources have enormous potential to provide the sort of consistent power that data centers crave.

json.creator: Ivan Mehta
json.title: ElevenLabs now lets authors create and publish audiobooks on its own platform
json.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
json.content: Voice AI company ElevenLabs is now letting authors publish AI-generated audiobooks on its own Reader app, TechCrunch has learned and the company confirmed. The announcement comes days after the company partnered with Spotify for AI-narrated audiobooks. ElevenLabs, which raised a $180 million mega-round last month, started inviting authors to try out their publishing program through […]
json.contentSnippet: Voice AI company ElevenLabs is now letting authors publish AI-generated audiobooks on its own Reader app, TechCrunch has learned and the company confirmed. The announcement comes days after the company partnered with Spotify for AI-narrated audiobooks. ElevenLabs, which raised a $180 million mega-round last month, started inviting authors to try out their publishing program through [‚Ä¶]

json.title: Data center tweaks could unlock 76 GW of new power capacity in the US
json.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
json.content: A new study argues that data centers could be ideal demand-response participants because they have the potential to be flexible.
json.contentSnippet: A new study argues that data centers could be ideal demand-response participants because they have the potential to be flexible.

json.creator: Sarah Perez
json.title: YouTube AI updates include auto dubbing expansion, age ID tech, and more
json.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
json.content: In his annual letter, YouTube CEO Neal Mohan dubbed AI one of the company’s four “big bets” for 2025. The executive pointed to the company’s investments in AI tools for creators, including ones for video ideas, thumbnails, and language translation. The latter feature will roll out to all creators in YouTube’s Partner Program this month, […]
json.contentSnippet: In his annual letter, YouTube CEO Neal Mohan dubbed AI one of the company‚Äôs four ‚Äúbig bets‚Äù for 2025. The executive pointed to the company‚Äôs investments in AI tools for creators, including ones for video ideas, thumbnails, and language translation. The latter feature will roll out to all creators in YouTube‚Äôs Partner Program this month, [‚Ä¶]

json.title: Self Inspection raises $3M for its AI-powered vehicle inspections
json.dc:creator: Sean O'Kane
json.content: A number of startups are racing to make vehicle inspections faster, easier, and cheaper. Self Inspection, a startup based in San Diego, thinks it has them all beat with its AI-powered service — and now it has convinced outside investors. Self Inspection, founded in 2021, is set to announce Thursday it’s raised $3 million in […]

Self Inspection, a startup based in San Diego, thinks it has them all beat with its AI-powered service ‚Äî and now it has convinced outside investors. Self Inspection, founded in 2021, is set to announce Thursday it‚Äôs raised $3 million in [‚Ä¶]

json.title: Meta turns to solar ‚Äî again ‚Äî in its data center-building boom
json.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
json.content: The announcement comes as Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg maintains the company‚Äôs ambitious AI strategy, which will require hefty capital investments in data centers.
json.contentSnippet: The announcement comes as Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg maintains the company‚Äôs ambitious AI strategy, which will require hefty capital investments in data centers.

The social media company inked three deals in the U.S. to power its data centers and offset its carbon footprint.
Mitti Labs is working with The Nature Conservancy to expand the use of climate-friendly rice farming practices in India. The startup uses its AI to verify reductions in methane emissions.

After developing a facial-recognition app for Meta‚Äôs Ray-Ban glasses and doxing random people, two former Harvard students are now launching a startup that makes smart glasses with an always-on microphone.
The social media company is adding another tranche of solar to power a new AI data center in South Carolina.
Internet giant Cloudflare says it detected Perplexity crawling and scraping websites, even after customers had added technical blocks telling Perplexity not to scrape their pages.

American streets are incredibly dangerous for pedestrians. A San Carlos, California-based startup called Obvio thinks it can change that by installing cameras at stop signs -- a solution the founders also say won‚Äôt create a panopticon.
Microsoft's sustainability goals are imperiled by its push into AI and cloud services.
Gridcare raised $13.3 million for its data platform that finds underutilized capacity on the electrical grid.
The company already has more than 12 gigawatts of capacity in its renewable power portfolio.
Rather than divide people into demographic buckets, Northwind Climate analyzes survey responses for behavioral clues.
New and expanded data centers are expected to double the sector‚Äôs power demand by 2029 as tech companies rush to capitalize on AI.
The Open Power AI Consortium says it will use domain-specific AI models to tackle problems in the power industry.
The company recently signed a deal with energy provider AES for three solar projects across the Midwest.
Geothermal resources have enormous potential to provide the sort of consistent power that data centers crave.

Voice AI company ElevenLabs is now letting authors publish AI-generated audiobooks on its own Reader app, TechCrunch has learned and the company confirmed. The announcement comes days after the company partnered with Spotify for AI-narrated audiobooks. ElevenLabs, which raised a $180 million mega-round last month, started inviting authors to try out their publishing program through [‚Ä¶]
A new study argues that data centers could be ideal demand-response participants because they have the potential to be flexible.

In his annual letter, YouTube CEO Neal Mohan dubbed AI one of the company‚Äôs four ‚Äúbig bets‚Äù for 2025. The executive pointed to the company‚Äôs investments in AI tools for creators, including ones for video ideas, thumbnails, and language translation. The latter feature will roll out to all creators in YouTube‚Äôs Partner Program this month, [‚Ä¶]

A number of startups are racing to make vehicle inspections faster, easier, and cheaper. Self Inspection, a startup based in San Diego, thinks it has them all beat with its AI-powered service ‚Äî and now it has convinced outside investors. Self Inspection, founded in 2021, is set to announce Thursday it‚Äôs raised $3 million in [‚Ä¶]
The announcement comes as Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg maintains the company‚Äôs ambitious AI strategy, which will require hefty capital investments in data centers.

json.title: This Week in AI: Solar Power and Startups Rise
json.intro: This week, the intersection of AI and sustainability takes center stage as major tech firms invest heavily in solar power. Alongside this, innovative startups are emerging to tackle climate challenges and enhance daily technology use.

sections.heading: Converge Bio Secures $25M to Revolutionize Drug Discovery
sections.summary: AI-driven drug discovery startup Converge Bio has raised $25 million in Series A funding led by Bessemer Venture Partners, with notable backing from executives at Meta, OpenAI, and Wiz. The funding will propel its efforts in transforming pharmaceutical research through artificial intelligence.

sections.heading: Meta's substantial solar investments continue
sections.summary: Meta has significantly ramped up its renewable energy initiatives, securing multiple solar power deals, including a recent purchase of 1 GW. These efforts are part of Meta's strategy to support its expanding AI data center operations while addressing its carbon footprint.

sections.heading: Innovative Solutions for Climate-Concerns Among Farmers
sections.summary: Mitti Labs partners with The Nature Conservancy to leverage AI in supporting rice farmers in India combat climate change. By validating methane reduction practices, the startup aims to enhance sustainability in agriculture and promote eco-friendly farming methods.

sections.heading: New Smart Glasses from Harvard Dropouts
sections.summary: Two former Harvard students, notorious for developing a controversial app for Meta's Ray-Ban glasses, are launching a new venture focused on 'always on' AI smart glasses. These innovative glasses will feature a built-in microphone, allowing for continuous recording of conversations.

sections.heading: Data Centers Eye Solar Power to Meet Rising Demands
sections.summary: As data center growth accelerates, companies like Microsoft and Meta are adding significant solar capacity to power their operations. This trend highlights the increasing reliance on renewable energy to not only meet demand but also align with sustainability goals.

json.why_it_matters: The rise of AI-driven innovations in sectors like agriculture and healthcare, combined with a strong push towards renewable energy, signifies a pivotal shift in how technology can address pressing global challenges, particularly climate change.
json.closing: As these developments unfold, the synergy between AI advancements and sustainable practices will play a critical role in shaping the future landscape of technology.

json.html_content:
This Week in AI: Solar Power and Startups Rise

This week, the intersection of AI and sustainability takes center stage as major tech firms invest heavily in solar power. Alongside this, innovative startups are emerging to tackle climate challenges and enhance daily technology use.

Converge Bio Secures $25M to Revolutionize Drug Discovery

AI-driven drug discovery startup Converge Bio has raised $25 million in Series A funding led by Bessemer Venture Partners, with notable backing from executives at Meta, OpenAI, and Wiz. The funding will propel its efforts in transforming pharmaceutical research through artificial intelligence.

Read more

Meta's substantial solar investments continue

Meta has significantly ramped up its renewable energy initiatives, securing multiple solar power deals, including a recent purchase of 1 GW. These efforts are part of Meta's strategy to support its expanding AI data center operations while addressing its carbon footprint.

Read more

Innovative Solutions for Climate-Concerns Among Farmers

Mitti Labs partners with The Nature Conservancy to leverage AI in supporting rice farmers in India combat climate change. By validating methane reduction practices, the startup aims to enhance sustainability in agriculture and promote eco-friendly farming methods.

Read more

New Smart Glasses from Harvard Dropouts

Two former Harvard students, notorious for developing a controversial app for Meta's Ray-Ban glasses, are launching a new venture focused on 'always on' AI smart glasses. These innovative glasses will feature a built-in microphone, allowing for continuous recording of conversations.

Read more

Data Centers Eye Solar Power to Meet Rising Demands

As data center growth accelerates, companies like Microsoft and Meta are adding significant solar capacity to power their operations. This trend highlights the increasing reliance on renewable energy to not only meet demand but also align with sustainability goals.

Read more

Why It Matters

The rise of AI-driven innovations in sectors like agriculture and healthcare, combined with a strong push towards renewable energy, signifies a pivotal shift in how technology can address pressing global challenges, particularly climate change.

As these developments unfold, the synergy between AI advancements and sustainable practices will play a critical role in shaping the future landscape of technology.
